Definition

Namespace:

Represents the upgrade status of the application instance.

Methods

GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)

Edit

Specifies a helper method that returns a collection of upgrade domains that have changed to the RollingForwardCompleted state or the RollingForwardInProgress state since the GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) method was called.

public ReadOnlyCollection<UpgradeDomainStatus> GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress previousProgress)Public Function GetChangedUpgradeDomains(previousProgress As ApplicationUpgradeProgress) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of UpgradeDomainStatus)
Parameters
previousProgress
ApplicationUpgradeProgress ApplicationUpgradeProgress

The previous ApplicationUpgradeProgress object.

Returns
ReadOnlyCollection<UpgradeDomainStatus> ReadOnlyCollection(Of UpgradeDomainStatus)

A helper method that returns a collection of upgrade domains.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

The application name or the application type of the previousProgress parameter does not match the application name or application type of this object.
